headline: Jacob’s Pillow Plans Dorrance Dance Week
abstract: For the 2020 festival, Dorrance Dance will be featured in performances and pop up interventions all over the campus.
lead_paragraph: Dorrance Dance will take over Jacob’s Pillow for a week in July as a part of the 2020 festival. The acclaimed tap company led by Michelle Dorrance will debut several new works all over the Pillow campus in Becket, Mass.
